rooms.description: Spacious living area with high ceilings and raw concrete walls, incorporating large openings for natural light. Designed to be wheelchair accessible.
Open plan kitchen with an emphasis on raw materials and exposed concrete. Features a wheelchair-accessible counter and appliance placement.
Integrated dining area within the living room space, designed for multifunctional use and clear movement paths.
Dedicated home theater with acoustic treatments. Provides ample seating arranged in a semi-circular layout for wheelchair accessibility.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom located near the living area, featuring grab bars and sufficient space for maneuvering.

openings.description: Reinforced concrete entrance door with wheelchair ramp integrated to provide smooth transition from exterior to interior.
Ramps and stairs designed in the same raw concrete style with necessary handrails for wheelchair access.
